text: Bruno Hartrell was a soccer executive who owned the Toronto Lynx. ==Toronto Lynx== Hartrell purchased United Soccer League expansion franchise Toronto Lynx for $50,000. The club was in the first division until 2006 when they decided to move to the Premier Development League for the 2007 season. ==Personal life== He is married to Nicole. He also owns an accounting firm. ==References== Category:Canadian soccer chairmen and investors Category:Canadian accountants
title: Bruno Hartrell
